description:
For this week's update, Tommy will be playing with the absolutely ripped 23 year old Marcus (not to be confused with Marcus Mojo).

He says he's into both guys and girls, and is down to play whenever time permits. He enjoys a good massage, and that's exactly what Tommy gives this guy...He also sneaks in a BJ for good measure. Marcus doesn't want to be selfish, so he gives Tommy a good suckdown as well.

After moving from a 69, Marcus spews his hot man-milk all over Tommy face, while Tommy shoots his jism across his own stomach.

Enjoy!
title: Tommy Loves Man-Milk
